description: This file initializes a vector database, sets up a knowledge base with CSV URLs and metadata, and creates an agent to query the knowledge base with specific filters. It appears to be part of a data processing or knowledge management system.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base, capable of performing searches and generating responses.

classes.name: CSVUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads data from CSV URLs and supports filtering.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A vector database implementation used to store and query data efficiently.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads all documents into the vector database, recreating the database if specified.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response based on a query, formatted as markdown.
